code: import{applyMiddleware,combineReducers,createStore}from"redux";import authReducer from"./authReducer";import dialogReducer from"./dialogReducer";import navbarReducer from"./navbarReducer";import profileReducer from"./profileReducer";import usersReducer from"./usersReducer";import thunkMiddleware from'redux-thunk';import{reducer as formReducer}from'redux-form';import appReducer from"./appReducer";var reducers=combineReducers({navbar:navbarReducer,profilePage:profileReducer,dialogsPage:dialogReducer,usersPage:usersReducer,auth:authReducer,form:formReducer,app:appReducer});var store=createStore(reducers,applyMiddleware(thunkMiddleware));window.store=store;export default store;
